HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Doručena zdarma pro objednávky v hodnotě nad 900 Kč. Do 14. 7. platí akce na dopravu zdarma s nákupem nad 700 Kč s kódem DOPRAVA07.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: běžně do dvou dnů od fakturace

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Doručena zdarma pro objednávky v hodnotě nad 900 Kč. Do 14. 7. platí akce na dopravu zdarma s nákupem nad 700 Kč s kódem DOPRAVA07.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Avon.cz offers home delivery via an unspecified courier service and pickup at Parcel Shops (Balíkovna, Česká pošta). Delivery is typically within two days of invoicing. Shipping is free for orders over 900 Kč, with a temporary promotion for free shipping on orders over 700 Kč. Standard shipping costs for orders below the threshold are not mentioned.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The business model is based on Avon representatives. The first order for a new representative can only be delivered to a post office. Cash on delivery is mentioned as mandatory for representatives under 18, but the surcharge is not specified.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is not located on a dedicated page but is embedded within the FAQ section for Avon representatives. The information is basic and lacks key details such as standard shipping fees, the name of the courier company, and options for express or weekend delivery.
